title: Todo App
description: A todo app created entirely in Python using the Streamlit library.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This website is created in Python using the Streamlit Library. It's hosted on AWS and built and deployed using CI/CD through GitHub Actions.

title: Job Application Tracker App
description: A tracker for job applications created in Python using the PySimpleGUI library.

title: House Manager Web App
description: A web app to open and close a door in a house and manage the temperature using a thermostat.

title: Company Website
description: A website to showcase a business, including a contact form.

title: PDF Generation Script
description: A Python script to generate a PDF file from a CSV file of topics to study.

title: Text to PDF Conversion Script
description: A Python script to convert text into PDF.

title: PDF Invoice Generator Script
description: A Python script to convert Excel files into PDF invoices.

title: NASA Picture of the Day Website
description: A website to display the NASA Picture of the Day with title and description.

title: Weather API
description: An app built with Flask and SQLite which returns the average temperature for any day at stations across Europe.

title: Forecast Data App
description: A Streamlit app to show the forecast for the upcoming days.

title: Happiness Data App
description: A Streamlit app to show the relationship between generosity, happiness, and GDP between countries.

title: Book Analysis Notebook
description: A Jupyter Notebook to analyse a book, find the most used words, and perform sentiment analysis.

title: Diary Tone Analyzer App
description: An app to analyse the tone of diary entries using NLP and plot the positivity and negativity of each entry.

title: Webcam Object Detection App
description: An app that uses the webcam to spot when a new person enters the shop and sends an email with a picture of the new customer.

title: Webcam Overlap App
description: A Streamlit app that uses the webcam and overlays the day of the week and time on it.

title: Concert Tour Web Scraping App
description: A web scraping app that monitors a website for new tour announcements and stores the announcements in a database.

title: Web Temperature Scraping App
description: A web scraping app that logs the average world temperatures over time in a database and plots it in a Streamlit app.

title: Hotel Booking App
description: A Python app for booking a hotel using object-oriented programming.

title: Article Purchasing App
description: A Python app for purchasing an article using object-oriented programming.

title: Speed Calculator App
description: A Python app created using PyQt6 to calculate the average speed given distance and time.

title: Job Application App
description: A Python and Flask web app which accepts a job application form, saves it to a database, and emails the user.
